nodes.title: Description
nodes.body: A ritual which uses magical verbal formulas called dhāraṇī. This Knowledge Map category is used for rituals in which the main focus is the recitation of dhāraṇī; rituals in which dhāraṇī play a minor role should be listed under their own categories.

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga 
  • mi 'khrug pa'i gzungs chog thar pa'i lcags kyu 
  • gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs bklag pa dang mchod rten bzhengs pa'i cho ga'i lag len khrigs chags su bkod pa 
  • See also gzungs chog, gzhungs sgrub, gzungs sngags
